Some go digging for gold, I go digging for drama

summary: THE NIFFLER INTRODUCE TANITH BISHOP oh dear tanith bishop, we hope that you’re not too worried to go school, alas mommy dearest...
caption:
THE NIFFLER INTRODUCE TANITH BISHOP

oh dear tanith bishop, we hope that you’re not too worried to go school, alas mommy dearest would forget all about you. but we’ve heard you have places to go if she does, at least she got herself a new family now. don’t worry, we’re sure you’d be just fine little one. also please sends our regards to thomas, shouldn’t you as a best friend tell him that using your initials as a nickname is so one hundred twenty? forget me me not, miss tanith.

blog.description: Mostly HP but non exclusively // Huffelpuff and proud // sometimes I write but I mostly reblog

title: A new home (part 3)
body:
Part 1 part 2

Harry stood up, silent, as Neville’s words reached his brain. He was going to have a baby. A baby. Neville was going to have a baby and he didn’t have a single clue on who was the mother. Neville was going to have a baby. Neville had had sex with someone. Neville who, not so long ago was waltzing on its own after the Yule ball was going to have a baby. Neville who never dated anyone expect Ginny at the Yule ball was going to have a baby.

“How?” was somehow the only word his brain could manage.

“I’ve met this girl while you were um, hunting, and I don’t know how but we end up dating and now she’s pregnant. It wasn’t planned, but she’s almost here, so I have no other choice but to leave school. I talked to Professor McGonnagal before summer and that’s why I’m only studying herbology ten hours a day, six days out of seven. Once I have my NEWT I have a job at a flower shop. It won’t be easy, but my granny isn’t pleased with the new and hasn’t planned on helping me financially. She said she’ll help me with the practical things such as how to change a diaper and how to hold a baby but I need money to feed the baby and buy said diaper and so I need a job and

-Neville Neville stop please! You’re going to die if you don’t breath!

-It’s a little bit overwhelming.

-A little bit, yeah. Just breath for a few secs, okay?

-I don’t have a few secs! She’s due for early November!

-She?

-Yes, she.” Neville smiled, nodding. “A little girl. A watermelon sized baby girl. But that’s all I know! I just know she’s watermelon sized! And that she’ll be Scorpio. Why would I care about her muggle astrologic zodiac? I’m going to have a baby in a month Harry! A baby! I don’t know anything about baby! Or about anything in general. I’m just a kid, I’m not supposed to have a kid on my own, not now. I’m not even able to keep an eye on a toad! So a baby! I’m gonna make her fall or forget her in the bath or the train or

-I’ll help you! Neville, I’ll help you! I promise. You won’t be alone. You won’t be alone and it’s gonna be okay. Do you hear me, Neville Longbottom? You won’t be alone. Now breath. You’re gonna be a great dad, ok? Say it, you’re gonna be a great dad.

-I’m gonna be a great dad.

-Again.

-I’m gonna be a great dad.

-Does anyone except your grandmother and Professor McGonnagal know about him?

-Her parents and bestfriends.

-Are they supportive?

-They kicked her out of their home. She’s staying at her best friend’s place until we gather enough money to rent a flat.

-Shit I’m sorry… Do you… Are you guys together?

-Yes, since last year. But no one knew… Harry, you have to promise me you won’t be mad…

-Why would I? You haven’t get Ginny pregnant, right? Neville, you haven’t get Ginny pregnant?

-No no no! Plus you were together back then! I wouldn’t have!

-Geez. Then, who’s the girl?

-Promise you won’t be mad.

-You’re scaring me. But okay, I promise.

-I’m with Pansy Parkinson.

to be continued -> part 4

Girl, Potterhead, Virgo, hatstall. 
Ships Fremione, Snamione, Dramione, Drarry and Newtina, Scout/Miss Pauling, Medic/Pauling.
Thank you so much for reading my blog and, if you are interested in my collection of artworks, you may search my account @bloodcastle22737 on Instagram and like, comment or follow if you appreciate the contents. 
Please don't mind inboxing me or anything to share with me your thoughts and suggestions, thanks so much 😘

tags: fantastic beasts and where to find them
fantastic beasts the crimes of grindelwald
summary: Even if you don't trust JKR anymore, TRUST EZRA MILLER
body:
Even if you don’t trust JKR anymore, TRUST EZRA MILLER

Whether you believe JKR is breaking the canon or not, you know there’s a handsome yet aggressive cast in the FB series that just constantly goes wild roaring around when he senses any inconsistency in the plot.

summary:
She’s too energetic for his taste, but Gellert could see her appeal.
In possibly another place or time, perhaps the girls looks...
body:
Read My Mind (Queenie and Gellert as Percival Graves)

She’s too energetic for his taste, but Gellert could see her appeal.


In possibly another place or time, perhaps the girls looks would have swayed his opinions. With her golden curls that farmed high cheekbones, eyes a glimmery shade of deep emerald and body curved deliciously. Perhaps another time, perhaps another life.


She stands tall and proud in her long pale pink coat and strappy heels, a smile etched onto her face.


Gellert wishes he could admire her dimples more personally.


“Good morning, Mr. Graves! Lovely weather, isn’t it?” Queenie stares into his eyes, shoulders straight and he see’s why Abernathy is gone for her.


“Morning to you, Queenie.” Out comes Percival Graves’ voice, rich and silky and smooth. “It’s a bit warm for my taste, to be honest.”


Gellert catches a glimspe of himself in the mirror above Queenie’s desk, and his mood lessens more.


He misses the length of pale blond hair he has, his mismatched irises and his scruff on his chin; now he looks at himself during every passing chance, only to face the face of Percival Graves, The Director of Magical Security and the head of MACUSA’s Department of Magical Law Enforcement.


Should have gone with someone else, Gellert thinks.


“Mr. Graves sir, are you alright?”


“I’m sorry, someone else?” Queenie’s voice chirps in, and Gellert compares her to those pretty song birds Grandmothers kept in cages.


Pretty to look at for awhile, but growing more annoying as time passes.



It is then that Gellert feels it, just the smallest pressure against his head, like someones poked a finger against his forehead.

The pressure only increases, likes someones rapping their knuckles against his head. Knocking and knocking and waiting for the home owner to finally give in and answer the door.


He chances a glance upwards, as his eyes had strayed to the ground.


Queenie looks nervous.


“I’m fine, just a bit hot. Would you mind getting me some water?” Gellert shuts her out quickly, putting up wall after wall, locking each lock and swallowing every single key.


“On not at all!” He watches as she scurries off, her long pink coat fluttering about as her heels tap tap tap against the marbled flooring.


Gellert hasn’t played with a Legilimen in too long.



(Ask filled for @yourcoloursblendwithmine !!! I kinda added my own twist to it, so hopefully it isn’t horrible! Sorry the ending is kind of rushed, I didn’t want to just babble!😅)

(Ask filled for @yourcoloursblendwithmine !!! I kinda added my own twist to it, so hopefully it isn’t horrible! Sorry the ending is kind of rushed, I didn’t want to just babble!😅)

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Rose Weasley, Louis Weasley, Albus Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

tags: fantastic beasts the crimes of grindelwald
summary: My brain: So did JK Rowling have that thing where she kind of came up with Grindelwald as - a name/thing to put in, and then...
body:
My brain:

So did JK Rowling have that thing where she kind of came up with Grindelwald as - a name/thing to put in, and then later went to it to do more with/pick it up for something she needed, and then ended up with all these thoughts and ideas for this whole thing that just kept building and expanding and birthing more ideas and

(since like - book 7 suddenly has all this stuff that I don’t think was mostly really set up before that/was pretty just new-at-that-point, and is this whole story. But that makes sense as something - suddenly catching you and growing all these things.

And then still more ideas and grabbing the opportunity/wanting to do still more with them! (so, the movies now))


(to be clear I am not jk and have no idea what she’s thinking, just suddenly thought of this dynamic and how the shape of what we’re getting would fit with it.)

And then still more ideas and grabbing the opportunity/wanting to do still more with them! (so, the movies now))


(to be clear I am not jk and have no idea what she’s thinking, just suddenly thought of this dynamic and how the shape of what we’re getting would fit with it.)

tags: also dying would most likely reunite him with his friends
summary: Why I’m kind of okay with Remus’ death
body:
Why I’m kind of okay with Remus’ death

Okay, just to clearify, I am not at all okay with Remus dying (he is my favourite character after all), nor am I okay with a bunch of other wonderful characters being killed off, but just hear me out, okay?

When JKR apologized for Remus’ death on the anniversary of the Battle of Hogwarts, she said that the reason for killing him was that she did not want Harry to have more than one good father figure. Initially, Arthur was supposed to die in OotP by the snake attack, but she could not manage killing him, which meant that if Remus did not die later on, Harry would end up with two father figures. 

Now, of course I want Arthur to live, but if his death would mean that Remus lived…? As much as I don’t want to admit it, I would probably choose Remus over Arthur if I was only considering which character I like better…

But the thing is that while Remus is a character I care more deeply about than Arthur, I believe that Arthur’s death would be much worse than Remus’. One of the very saddest deaths in the HP series is Fred, because there was so many people left to mourn him and miss him, and especially George. Now imagine Fred’s death, but two years before that, the Weasley’s had lost their father. This is just too much for me to take, and if Remus’ death is the price I have to pay for the Weasley family not to break apart any more, then I guess I can live with that. 

I know this is all kind of random and maybe confusing i don’t know, but just remember this whenever you feel sad about Remus dying. Remember that if he hadn’t died, Arthur would have died instead, and that combined with Fred’s death would tear the Weasley family apart.

summary: On a related note - so Dumbledore iirc is pretty much generally the one who talks about Lily’s love’s and death’s protection on...
body:
On a related note - so Dumbledore iirc is pretty much generally the one who talks about Lily’s love’s and death’s protection on Harry, about it in his blood, etc, the one who tells us about it.

Which - is this a field he’s specifically gotten a lot of knowledge of, because of having what he and Grindelwald did (and then having to - deal with it afterwards, also)?
